Creates a new instance of TriangleMeshSubdividedIcosahedron

Parameters:
radius - The radius of the object
subdivisions - The number of subdivisions to do in total
flatSubdivisions - The number of unperturbed subdivisions to do
utils - The maths utility object
variation - The initial amount of max variation to be applied
progress - The progress reporting object
